The postdoctoral call from INRAE's Agroecosystem department is now open. If successful,  the department offers a 12-month position to start in fall 2025. If you are interested my research activities, feel free to contact me with your CV and a brief summary of project interests. I would like to prioritize projects on behavioral ecotoxicology and / or modeling but am of course open to your suggestions and ideas. The application must be submitted by the end of September, so make sure to contact me before **August 25, 2024** (*raphael.royaute@inrae.fr*).
